ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with comicbox 1.1.1 on 2024-03-14T03:39:22 [Issue ID 4000-520218] urn:comicvine:4000-520218 Tagged with ComicTagger 1.6.0a13.dev122 using info from Grand Comics Database on 2024-06-18 20:51:33. [Issue ID 1546668]
ComicInfo.Summary:
What puts Grumpy Cat in such a sour mood all the time? The better question is, what DOESN’T put her in a sour mood? Find out in this second sensational issue with the world’s grumpiest cat and Pokey, her fun-loving, big-hearted brother! They’re two cats that are too cute for words, one with a childlike wonder, and the other with a pouty expression that’d make runway models jealous. They’re an odd couple, for sure… and every moment of their misadventures are guaranteed to make you laugh!
*List of covers and their creators:* Cover | Name | Creator(s) | Sidebar Location | ----------------------------------------------- A | Cover A | Steve Uy | 1 | B | Cover B | Tony Fleecs | 2 | C | Cover C | Ken Haeser | 3 | Note: The credits page incorrectly lists Agnes Garbowska as the artist for cover B even though Tony Fleecs penname signature is visible.
